subject: Olympic Games (2024)
lead_paragraph: With a deadline 18 days away for the submission of a candidate from the United States to host the 2024 Games, Los Angeles’s plan for the athletes’ village remains a mystery in many ways.
snippet: With a deadline 18 days away for the submission of a candidate from the United States to host the 2024 Games, Los Angeles’s plan for the athletes’ village remains a mystery in many ways.
